entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for September 10, 2024

summary.caption:
Suddenly, Dr. Morrissey’s own creation, a hideous creature nine feet tall and bearing the heads of the Brady Bunch,
 turns against him.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for September 10, 2024

summary.caption: “I’m talking to you! … You’re so … so … so thick-membraned sometimes.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for September 10, 2024
The Far Side comic 4 for September 10, 2024

summary.caption:
“Say, honey … didn’t I meet you last night at the 
feeding frenzy?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for September 10, 2024

summary.caption: “You must be new here! ... That’s Miss Crutchfield, and she’s there to make sure nobody runs with scissors.”
